import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Integration By ID</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/integration/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns integration details for the specified ID.  

This request supports integrations with only the following:

* Okta
* Qualys
* Tenable

To get the integration ID, [list the metadata for all integrations](/prisma-cloud/api/cspm/get-all-integrations-metadata).
